Guangzhou INEO Kitchen Equipment Co., Ltd.
B316, Bldg No.1,No.329Yushan W.road,MOCA Creative Industry Park, Panyu Guangzhou,China 511400 86-15018748580 86-20-39292071 86-20-39292498 admin@cnineo.com http://www.cnineo.com
This supplier has been audited by the b2b tradett.com >Add to Company Favorites Products Restaurant Equipment Total 81 Product(s) We are professional restaurant equipment factory and supplier in China.We can produce restaurant equipment according to your requirements.More types of restaurant equipment wanted,please contact us right now! View:
10L Food Mixer B10 This model is equipped with three agirators which including Flat Beater,Spiral Hook and Wire Whip for your selection. Customer can swift the agirator easily based on which kind of food you need to process. It is a kind of bread making equipment which it is very suitable for bakery.
20 Tray Combi Oven WR-20-11 The combi-oven fulfils all cooking programs,such as baking,broiling,cooking and steaming for making many kinds of food.It is widely used in commercial kitchen such as restaurant and hotel.
20L Bakery Food Mixer B20F This model of food mixer is equipped with three agirators which can satisfy many kind of blend functions. Meanwhile, there is meat mincer application as well so that you can mince the meat at the same time. Quite suitable for catering kitchen.
American Style 3 Pan Bain Marie DM-55 Bain marie is a type of pot used to heat things to a controlled temperature. It is useful in applications in which overheating must be prevented to yield desirable results.The bain marie is used mainly in commercial kitchen such as buffet resturant and hotel.There are 2 room where can put some bowls and plates,cups and so on.
46L Wine Refrigerator JC-46 The capacity of this wine refrigerator is 46Litres. It is equipped with famous refrigerant which enable the wine maintain in a good condition always. Quite suitable for commercial use such as hotel and restaurant.
Electric 4 Hot-plate Cooker Oven ZH-TT-4A ZH-TT-4A The boby of Electric 4 Hot-plate Cooker&Oven is made of 304 stainless steel and it is very easy to clean. Electric heating element allow the cooking temperature reach 800 degree. Below the Hot plate cooker, there is a electric oven for other food cooking.
Electric Conveyor Dishwasher XLC-RA The body of Electric Conveyor Dishwasher is made of 304 stainless steel. The transmission direction (in out direction) can be adjust freely shows the working conditions operate simply and easily. And it is widely used on the commercial hotel restaurant.
Commercial Electric Combi Steamer WR-6-11 Electric models for 6 to 10 GN 1/1 have accessories for handling and transport which can be co-ordinated with blast chillers, heated holding cabinets, regenerators and combined models. They may be equipped with supports :simple, with rack holders or MA range heated holding cabinets.
Counter Top Gas Griddle TGH-21.R This kind of gas griddle is made of 304 stainless steel and it is widely used in commercial kitchen such as restaurant and hotel.
Counter Top Pasta Cooker TM-6 All stainless steel boday, good-looking and energy saving,fast&high;heating efficiency and with drain valve.
Commercial Rotisserie YXD-266X ,YXD-268X The body of this Electric Rotisseri is made of 304 stainless steel and there is reinforced glass in front and back. It is widely used in commercial kitchen such as restaurant and hotel.
Gas Range 6 Burner With Oven US-RQ-6 US-RQ-6,JUS-RQ-6 Gas Range is widely used in commercial field such as restaurant and hotel supplies.Gas Range 6 Burner With Oven is equipped with flame failure protection device and thermocouple safety device to make sure there will be no incident during its working. It is suitable for various gases such as LPG or Natural gas.
Glasswasher XWJ-XD-42 This kind of Glasswasher is made of 304 stainless steel has no sharp corner.And it is widely used on the commercial hotel restaurant.
Fast Food Gas Griddle GH-720 Gas Griddle is widely used in commercial hotel and restaurant. Whole boday made of stainless steel and the griddle surface is quite refined. And the ignition of this Gas Griddle is electronic.
Electric Stainless Steel Griddle GH-822 Electric Griddle is widely used in commercial hotel and restaurant.Whole boday made of stainless steel and the griddle surface is quite refined.High efficiency heating elements and temperature control function make this kitchen equipment more perfect.
Gas Lift Salamander REB-03 Gas lift Salamander is made of 304 stainless steel and it has the handle to adjust the height of the panel. It is the good kitchen equipment in restaurant and hotel.
Meat Mincer TC22 As a food processing equipment, this meat mincer is equipped with high efficiency gear driver which has high productivity. It is widely used in commercial kitchen like restauran and hotel for meat processing.
Meat Slicer MS220 ST This model of meat slicer is equipped with good coordination construction for the moving part and cutting blade so it enable people to control the slicing thickness percisely .It is widely used in commercial kitchen for meat slicing.
Food Cutting Machine TQ8 As a food cut up machine, it is mainly to cut meat,vegetable,melon and fruit to make fillings.Food contact parts are made of anti-corrosion Aluminium alloy and stainless steel that meet the national hygiene standard. Quite suitable for commercial kitchen use.
Commercial Dishwasher XWJ-2A The body of this dishwasher is made of 304 stainless steel has no sharp corner.The outer shell is mounted through slotting hanging craft,which is easy fast to disassemble. And it is widely used on hotel and restaurant.
